dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1420 IS: Child Care Nutrition Enhancement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenthal (for himself, Ms. Smith, Mrs. Shaheen, Ms. Warren, Mr. Welch, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Sanders, and Mrs. Gillibrand) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to increase the amount of reimbursements under the child and adult care food program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Child Care Nutrition Enhancement Act of 2025.

section.header: Reimbursements under child and adult care food program

subsection.text: Section 17 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1766) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in each of paragraphs (1), (2), and (3), by inserting and subject to paragraph (7) after subsection (f)(3) each place it appears; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: Beginning on the first day of the first month that begins after the date of enactment of the Child Care Nutrition Enhancement Act of 2025, each meal and supplement served under this section shall receive an additional reimbursement in the amount of 10 cents (as adjusted pursuant to section 11(a)).
in subsection (o)(3)(A), in the first sentence, by striking consulation and inserting consultation; and
in subsection (r)(4)(B)(ii), by striking subsection (c)(3) and inserting paragraphs (3) and (7) of subsection (c).

subsection.header: Reimbursement of family or group day care home sponsoring organizations
subsection.text: Section 17(f)(3) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1766(f)(3)) is amended—

clause.text: in the heading, by striking Tier i family or group day care homes and inserting Calculation of reimbursement;
by redesignating subclauses (II), (III), and (IV) as subclauses (I), (II), and (III), respectively;

subclause.text: by striking subclause (III), a tier I and inserting subclause (II), a; and
by striking , except that and all that follows through section 9;
by striking subclause (IV) and inserting subclause (III); and
by striking subclause (II) and inserting subclause (I); and

clause.text: by adding at the end the following:

subclause.text: The additional reimbursement amount required under subsection (c)(7) shall apply to the reimbursements of meals and supplements under this subparagraph.
